data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Jonathan Hogg for Huddersfield has been booked by Oliver Langford and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 19, Nottingham's Samba Sow has been booked in Huddersfield.
Jack Colback (Nottingham) gets a yellow card.
Carel Eiting (Huddersfield) has replaced the possibly injured Jonathan Hogg.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at John Smith's Stadium.
Huddersfield take a 1-0 lead thanks to Fraizer Campbell.
In the minute 54, That's a fine assist from Harry Toffolo.
Alexander Mighten is replacing Samba Sow for Nottingham at John Smith's Stadium.
Sammy Ameobi (Nottingham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 65, The away team replace Lyle Taylor with Lewis Grabban.
The home team have replaced Isaac Mbenza with Adama Diakhaby. This is the second substitution made today by Carlos Corberan.
At John Smith's Stadium, Richard Stearman has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 76, Sabri Lamouchi is making the team's third substitution at John Smith's Stadium with Joe Lolley replacing Luke Freeman.
Scott McKenna (Nottingham) has received a yellow card from Oliver Langford.
Jaden Brown is replacing Fraizer Campbell for the home team.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
